int NE_TextPrintBoxFree (int slot, int x, int y, int endx, int endy, u32 color, int charnum, const char *text)
 Prints text in a box of given coordinates.

Detailed Description

Text drawing functions using the 3D hardware. Functions accept '
', but don't 'd', 's'... You have to call NE_2DViewInit() before using any of them.

Function Documentation

Prints text in a rectangle.

Parameters:
slot Text slot to use.
x Start row.
y Start column.
endx End row.
endy End column.
color Text color.
charnum Number of characters to print. If -1 prints everything.
text Text to print.

int NE_TextPrintFree ( int  slot,
int  x,
int  y,
u32  color,
const char *  text 
)

Prints text in any coordinates.

Parameters:
slot Text slot to use.
x (x,y) Start position.
y (x,y) Start position.
color Text color.
text Text to print.
NOTE: '
' does NOT work in this function.
